TopicTitle: MET Timer from First stage ignition versus flight scene "launch"

Articles.Content: It looks like in 1.3 or 1.2, the MET timer was changed so that it starts running when you launch the flight scene. Is there a mod, a CFG entry, or whatever to change it so the MET timer starts when you actually launch?

Well probably, but is it that important really? I mean, even if you NEED to know the exact second you left, you can still remember how many seconds did it show when you left and then just use a calculator to put in your current time and then just deprive it by how many seconds did you have before takeoff. (But again, its really not that important, right?)
